videoSnippet.title: Deadly Egyptian || Amin vs Nakamura || GCT Cote d’Ivoire (2019)
videoSnippet.description:

Bassem Amin vs Hikaru Nakamura
Grand Chess Tour Cote d’Ivoire Abidjan CIV, rd 5, May-09 
Formation: King's Indian Attack (A07)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 e6 3. d3 Nc6 4. g3 g6 5. Bg2 Bg7 6. O-O d6 7. c3 Nf6 8. Re1 O-O 9. d4 e5 10. dc5 dc5 11. Qd8 Rd8 12. Na3 Ne8 13. Bf1 f6 14. Bc4 Kf8 15. Be3 b6 16. Bd5 Bd7 17. Nb5 Rab8 18. a4 a6 19. Na3 Ne7 20. Bb3 Nc6 21. Nd2 Nc7 22. f4 Bh6 23. Kg2 Na5 24. Bc2 Bc6 25. b4 Nb7 26. Ndc4 ef4 27. gf4 b5 28. ab5 ab5 29. Nb6 cb4 30. cb4 Nd6 31. Kg3 Be4 32. Bc5 Bc2 33. Nc2 Kg8 34. Nd4 Nc4 35. Nc4 bc4 36. Nc6 Rd3 37. Kf2 Rb7 38. f5 c3 39. Re2 Bf8 40. Bf8 Kf8 41. fg6 hg6 42. Ra5 Rb6 43. Rc5 Ne8 44. Ne7 Kf7 45. Nd5 Rb7 46. b5 Nd6 47. Nc3 g5 48. Kg2 Kg6 49. Rb2 Nf5 50. Ne4 Ne3 51. Kg1 Re7 52. Nf2 Ra3 53. Rc1 Rb7 54. h3 Ra5 55. Rc5 Nf5 56. Ne4 Nd4 57. Nd6 Rd7 58. Nc4 Ra1 59. Kf2 Rh7 60. b6 Ra8 61. b7 Rb8 62. Nd6 Rh3 63. Rb4 Rh2 64. Kf1 Rh1 65. Kg2 Rd1 66. Rc8 Rd2 67. Kf1 Nf3 68. Rb3 Rb7 69. Nb7 g4 70. Nc5 Rc2 71. Rd3 Kf5 72. Nb7 Rb2 73. Nd6 Ke6 74. Re8 Kd7 75. Re2 Rb1 76. Kf2 Ne5 77. Rdd2 Kc6 78. Ne4 Rb3 79. Rd6 Kb5 80. Rf6 Nd3 81. Kg2 Ra3 82. Rf5 Kc4 83. Nf2 Nb4 84. Re4 Kc3 85. Re3

The Côte d’Ivoire Rapid & Blitz is the 1st stage of the 2019 Grand Chess Tour, with World Champion Magnus Carlsen heading a 10-player field that features 7 tour regulars and wild cards Wei Yi, Veselin Topalov and Bassem Amin. The event takes place in the Pullman Abidjan Hotel in Abidjan, Ivory Coast from May 8-12 and has a $150,000 prize fund.

The rapid section is a single round-robin with 3 rounds each day on the first 3 days. The time control is 25 minutes for all moves and a 10-second delay from move 1. The final 2 days are a blitz double round-robin, with 18 rounds of 5 minutes + 3-second delay blitz. Rapid games count double, with 2 points for a win and 1 for a draw. 

Official website: grandchesstour.org/2019-grand-chess-tour/2019-Cote-dIvoire-Rapid-Blitz
